qu:Page.name: Instructions
qu:Page.qu:Instructions: Dear ${USER.NAME}! For the assessment, please fill out the following questionnaire. You can express your agreement with the attributes by ticking the value that most closely reflects your impression. Please decide spontaneously. Don't think too long about your decision to make sure that you convey your original impression. Sometimes you may not be completely sure about your agreement with a particular attribute or you may find that the attribute does not apply completely to ${SURVEY.RESOURCE}. Nevertheless, please make a selection on every item. It is your personal opinion that counts. Please remember: there is no wrong or right answer!
